article_title: Five Steps to Competitive Advantage with the Cloud
article_text: Early cloud adopters have learned that implementing SaaS isn’t always as fast or easy as it’s cracked up to be. As companies consider cloud-based ERP solutions, the lessons of early SaaS adopters become all the more important.

twitter.description: Companies that develop a cloud strategy as an integral part of the overarching business strategy see higher returns, write Guest Contributors Mike Pearl and Alison Millar of PwC. But first steps can be tricky. Proper implementation requires “equal parts courage, discipline, C-Suite collaboration and a strong approach to manage risk.”
twitter.title: Five Steps to Competitive Advantage with the Cloud
